channel.title: Broadband Equity Access and Deployment Program on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Broadband Equity Access and Deployment Program on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Can we please keep our broadband money, Republican governor asks Trump admin
item.description: Governor worries Trump won’t let states spend entire $42 billion broadband fund.

item.title: Starlink wants billions in grants, but state governments aren’t cooperating
item.description: Despite Trump’s backing, states aren’t giving Starlink the money it demanded.

item.title: SpaceX says states should dump fiber plans, give all grant money to Starlink
item.description: SpaceX seeks more cash, calls fiber “wasteful and unnecessary taxpayer spending.”

item.title: Starlink tries to block Virginia’s plan to bring fiber Internet to residents
item.description: SpaceX wants more money, asks Trump admin to reject state’s broadband grant plan.

item.title: Trump admin warns states: Don’t try to lower broadband prices
item.description: ISPs getting grants must offer “low-cost” plan, but they get to pick the price.
